price: Ԑberε biara a wͻ’pε sε wͻ’fri emu ahoͻyaa (anaa emu haw) no mu no, na yasan aka wͻn kͻ mu, na (yaka akyerε wͻn sε): ”Monka ͻhyeε asotwee no nhwε.
arabic: كُلَّمَآ أَرَادُوٓاْ أَن يَخۡرُجُواْ مِنۡهَا مِنۡ غَمٍّ أُعِيدُواْ فِيهَا وَذُوقُواْ عَذَابَ ٱلۡحَرِيقِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: kullamā arādū an yakhrujū min'hā min ghammin uʿīdū fīhā wadhūqū ʿadhāba al-ḥarīqi
